channel.title: Comments on: Don’t fall for the social engineering scam that makes you go to ammyy.com
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
I have nothing against my fellow IT folks in India, but they are fast becoming a computer criminal domain for many people.

This isn’t the first time someone has been scammed by an opportunist in India…no wonder their economy is booming and ours is failing (joking-ish).

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: I know my parents won't do anything to their (uhm mine) computer before asking me, which is fine. But most people don't have a geek nearby to ask for advice and will just do it. And they only need a small percentage.
item.content:encoded: I know my parents won’t do anything to their (uhm mine) computer before asking me, which is fine. But most people don’t have a geek nearby to ask for advice and will just do it. And they only need a small percentage.
